welcome.subtitle: Ambient, electronic and acoustic music. Sometimes a singer too.

about.title: Hi, I'm Matt and I make music.
about.description: I make ambient, electronic, acoustic and sometimes alternative music. Playing guitar, bass and piano (and some other funny instruments). If you wanna listen to it, just keep scrolling. Here on this site you can find all of it and listen to it freely.

albums.title: All of my work
albums.description: Feel free to listen to any of it on this site

projects.title: My other projects
projects.description: See my other music projects and listen to them as well!
